i_p1: The international internship gives the participants of the program the opportunity to get acquainted with world practices and the latest trends in the field of business technologies.
i_p2: The academic part of the program is adapted to the level and interests of the group, includes training seminars, lectures, debates.
i_p3: In addition, in parallel with the training, we offer an interesting informational and cultural-entertaining program that will help project participants to get acquainted with the sights of the partner countries.
